5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

make-modifier-state

Function

Summary

Returns a modifier state for the specified modifiers.

Signature

make-modifier-state #rest modifiers => integer

Arguments

modifiers
An instance of type limited(<sequence>, of: <integer>).

Values

integer
An instance of type <integer>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Returns a modifier state for modifiers.

See also

event-modifier-state, page 266

gesture-modifier-state, page 283

port-modifier-state, page 331

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
